      • install

        public void install(java.io.File applicationDirectory,
                    java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                    PackageInfo packageInfo)
             throws InstallPackageServiceException
        Description copied from interface: InstallPackageProvider
        This method install a package in a valid gvSIG directory.
        Specified by:
        install in interface InstallPackageProvider
        Parameters:
        applicationDirectory - the directory where gvSIG is located.
        inputStream - the stream that contains the package information.
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException - if there is a problem reading the stream or installing the package.

      • installLater

        public void installLater(java.io.File applicationDirectory,
                         java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                         PackageInfo packageInfo)
                  throws InstallPackageServiceException,
                         java.io.IOException
        This function will is called when an exception is produced during the installation of a plugin. It will prepare the package to be installed on the next gvSIG restart.
        Specified by:
        installLater in interface InstallPackageProvider
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException
        java.io.IOException
